name: Epispeed
overview: EpiSpeed AG engages in the provision and licensing of sampling wafers to device manufacturers. It offers a range of substrates and epiwafers based on silicon and germanium, which include virtual Ge substrates, strained SiGe structures, layer design, sacrificial layers for MEMS applications, and amorphous silicon or germanium. The company also offers consulting services in the areas, such as development and manufacturing of epitaxial semiconductor coatings, equipment design and manufacturing for coating applications, and writing and reviewing of business plans, as well as support for acquiring venture capital, contract reviewing, and negotiations with investors. In addition, EpiSpeed provides prototyping services for research and development phase. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.
